name: Red Sauce
ingredients: 1/2 to 3/4 cup olive oil (get the best you can afford)
instructions: Place olive oil and garlic in a medium sized sauce pan.
Heat until garlic is golden (but don't burn it!).
Add tomato sauce, red pepper, and basil.
Simmer for as long as you can (minimum one hour).

other.name: Optional
ul: 1 egg (just crack it and stir it in)

yield: Enough sauce for a pound of pasta, or 8 calzone.
